body.name: Magnetic Stove Top Shelf, 30" Stove Rack Magnetic Shelf for Kitchen Storage, Kitchen Shelf for Stove Organizer Above Stovetop Flat Back of Stove - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 44 mins
features: 【UPGARADED DESIGN】-The upgraded silicone stove rack design is not prone to water accumulation. The 2.34 inches back bar design protects the bottles from falling off and greatly improving its safety. The shelf adopts a detachable segmented design, with 2 independent functional partitions, which can be combined or disassembled as needed, and the spices are stored in an orderly manner also be kept within reachable range.

【STRONGER MAGNETS】-We have embedded 6 high-quality stronger long magnetic plates at the bottom of the silicone kitchen shelf, with three in each partition. Enhanced its firmness stability and greater anti-slip ability.

【HIGH QUALITY SILICONE】- Compare to the traditional magnetic shelf, our silicone magnetic top shelf has better flexibility, durability. It is made for anti-slip, heat-resistance and it is easier to clean. Especially our stove top rack is made of harder silicone that is absolute hot-resistance, compare to the regular shelf, our shelf is 2 times heavier and thicker than the regular stove top shelf. It has better flexibility and longer product life and also it is oil resistant.

【TIPS & WARNING】- Ours Magnetic shelf is composed of two independent shelves with total length of 15" and a depth of 3.54", zero installation. Just place this magnetic shelf on top of your stove and you're all set. Please be sure to wipe clean the top of the stove/oven before use. Please make sure the top is flat for the stove.

【OUR GUARANTEE】- All of our product comes with lifetime warranty for our customers. If you receive our product damaged or missing parts, or you are not satisfied with the product which are not suitable for your stove, please don’t hesitate to contact us via amazon and we will get back to you with solutions within 24 hours!
body.description: After our first stove top shelf, our team has collected a lots of voices from the market and came up with this newly designed stove top shelf. It is made of harder silicone, thicker back bar and most importantly, greater looking design for your stove.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 6X Long Magnetics Extra longer & thicker magticks to improve the shelf's ability to stick on the stove. Higher&Thicker Bars Higher & harder back bars liminated the gap between stove top and the wall, better alibility to prevent the bottles from falling. More Than Just For The Stoves The clean & neat design of the shelf could be used on the places like kitchen sink area, bathroom sink and more!
Why Choose TukSok Stove Top Shelf

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This helped me reorganize alot of the seasonings and olive oils that I use while cooking. It works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great on my stove!
reviews.reviewText: Love this item however, it wish it was one piece instead of 2 pieces. Looks great on my stove and the magnetic feature keeps it nice and secure. Holds a lot of items..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on top of my stove, and stays in place well with the magnets inside it. Holds all my standard size spice bottles with no issues and none of them falling off. It has a little lip on it to keep everything in place. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comes in two pieces
reviews.reviewText: I should have read more closely, this comes in two pieces and you can clearly see that when on the stove. I like the shelf but I am going to have to glue the two pieces together because I do not like the gap it causes because they do not line up perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing for your kitchen
reviews.reviewText: My mom is forever putting spices or trinkets on the top of her stove only for them to be bumped off and then fall to the back. This item here is magnetic and sticks to her stove and with the lip to the front, nothing can fall onto the stove and with the small “wall” or “lip” on the back, nothing can fall behind the stove again. Everyone who has came into the house has commented on it. I think even my sister has bought one and I plan on getting myself one. Too bad I can’t get commission for helping to sell more. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: This item is not sturdy nor holds it shapeThe two pieces don't connect properly so there is an open seam. I do not recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great, it is 2 piece tho, not one solid piece as pictured
reviews.reviewText: the product works great. It is made to appear as one piece by the photos, however it is cut down the middle. that said, it lays perfectly flat after settling and until your up close you can't tell its not a solid piece. would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice item works well
